<input type="checkbox" id="checkbox1" class="styled">如何加载pdf

```{r}
list.files() %>% 
    str_subset('.Rmd$') %>% 
    map(
        ~xfun::read_utf8(.) %>% 
            str_subset('checkbox') %>% 
            str_remove_all('<input type="checkbox" id="checkbox1" class="styled">') %>% 
            as_tibble
        ) %>% 
    bind_rows %>% 
    filter(!value %>% str_detect('str_subset|str_remove_all'))
```
